reviewText: The best 80s style comedy you're ever going to see.  Best dumb comedy since Dumb & Dumber.

This movie will be a cult classic.
Guarantee
brand new perfect condition, favorite movie!
Still one of my favorite movies, quote this movie every day it will always be a classic to me.

I first encountered Andy Samberg when I watched a preview for Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping. While it was funny, this older work of Samberg is even better. Some people have compared Hot Rod to Napoleon Dynamite, which is not unfair. But I enjoyed Hot Rod more. If you like this movie, and Samberg's acting style, be sure to check out Brooklyn 99.
